title: Studio 12.5 in. Silicone and Stainless Steel Serving Spoon
description: This Studio 12.5 in. serving spoon is an indispensable tool for any kitchen. Made of heat-resistant silicone and durable, high-quality stainless steel, you'll be hard pressed to find a more long-lasting utensil. Will not absorb odors or flavors, and is dishwasher safe.Head made of high-quality, heat-resistant siliconeStainless steel handle for durability and longevityDishwasher safeHandle loop for easy storage
